mapper.insert: insert into STORES (STORE_ID, CITY_CODE, STORE_NAME, CATEGORY, ADDRESS, LATITUDE, LONGITUDE,VIEWS,CREATED_DATE) VALUES (#{store_id},#{city_code},#{store_name},#{category},#{address},#{latitude},#{longitude},0,now())
mapper.update: update stores set views=views+1 where store_id=#{storeID}
mapper.select: select * from likes join stores on likes.store_id = stores.store_id where likes.user_id = #{userID}
mapper.delete: delete from stores where store_id=#{storeID} and user_id=#{userID}
